thread.title: Bungie Addresses Destiny Microtransaction Concerns

title: Bungie Addresses Destiny Microtransaction Concerns
text:
Bungie Addresses Destiny Microtransaction Concerns 
Published By: Gamespot.com - Today 
Destiny's new microtransactions are currently limited to emotes only. Though Bungie may one day expand the offerings, don't expect to be abl...
